body_html: I have had the same problem ever since I first tried to use tensorboard a few days ago (with 0.6.0). The problem persists in Firefox, Konqueror, AND Chrome (!), and it is not fixed by reinstalling as a git clone after issue #650 nor by updating any of the dependencies as suggested on various other threads. I'm using CentOS 7. However, I am not seeing any error message such as reported by Charlie-Huang.

body: I have had the same problem ever since I first tried to use tensorboard a few days ago (with 0.6.0). The problem persists in Firefox, Konqueror, AND Chrome (!), and it is not fixed by reinstalling as a git clone after issue #650 nor by updating any of the dependencies as suggested on various other threads. I'm using CentOS 7. However, I am not seeing any error message such as reported by Charlie-Huang.
